name: Skell
description:
a short little rpg demo about a boy named skell. this was originally going to be a hack 'n slash inspired by zenonia and pokemon. this was my first dive into trying to make an rpg in around 2009-2010. it started off as a grid-based movement engine which tried to emulate pokemon's movement system and evolved into something i wanted to make original.  

made in collab with "Dark Matter"  who programmed everything!!
